DOC.brief_title: Long-term Effects Green Tea Gut Flora , Fat Absorption , Body Composition Resting Energy Expenditure
DOC.detailed_description: Green tea may positive effect weight control body composition via several approach positive effect gut flora , decrease fat absorption intestine increase rest energy expenditure . We would like investigate long-term effect green tea gut flora , fat absorption , rest energy expenditure body composition . The study conduct randomize , placebo-controlled , double-blind parallel design four group consist control group green tea group normal weight subject obese subject . At three time point ( baseline , 6 week 12 week ) faeces collect analyze gut flora composition fat content . Furthermore , measurement rest energy expenditure body composition conduct . Activity measure three week ( baseline , week 6 week 12 ) . hundred healthy subject ( 50 male 50 female ) BMI 18.5-25 kg/m2 ≥30 kg/m2 age 18-50 year include study . All subject non-smoking , non tea-drinkers , weight stable , dietary unrestraint , moderate alcohol caffeine consumer . Subjects free medication except oral contraceptive use woman . Intervention ( applicable ) : Subjects receive either green tea placebo capsule form baseline measurement , consume three time daily period twelve week .
